## Classes

### xcat

Primarily houses variables that are used by both xcat::master
and xcat::client

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include xcat
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `xcat` class.

##### `network_mgmt`

Data type: `String`

- String
xCAT boot and mgmt network, in CIDR format

##### `network_ipmi`

Data type: `String`

- String
xCAT IPMI network, in CIDR format

### xcat::client

Setup access from xcat master to xcat client

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include xcat::client
```

### xcat::client::ssh

Allow passwdless root access from xcat master node

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include xcat::client::ssh
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `xcat::client::ssh` class.

##### `master_node_ip`

Data type: `String`

- String
IP address of xcat master node

### xcat::master

Configure an xcat master node

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include xcat::master
```

### xcat::master::bmc_smtp

Forward email from node BMC's to MDA on local (master) node

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include xcat::master::bmc_smtp
```

### xcat::master::nfs

##### 

```puppet
include xcat::master::nfs
```

### xcat::master::postscripts

Install postscripts from templates using hiera data

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include xcat::master::postscripts
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `xcat::master::postscripts` class.

##### `defsnapshot`

Data type: `String`

- String
default snapshot identifier for general repos (CentOS, EPEL, Puppet, etc.)

##### `reposerverip`

Data type: `String`

- String
mgmt IP of site server with current repos

##### `install_dir`

Data type: `String`



### xcat::master::root

Setup root account

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include xcat::master::root
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `xcat::master::root` class.

##### `sshkey_pub`

Data type: `String`

- String
public part of root's sshkey
installed on all client nodes for passwdless access
from xcat mn

##### `sshkey_priv`

Data type: `String`

- String
private part of root's sshkey

##### `sshkey_type`

Data type: `String`

- String
Currently, xcat supports only rsa
sshkeys are stored in /root/id_<TYPE>* files
(optional, defaults to 'rsa')
